```{r}
#install.packages("kableExtra")
library("kableExtra")
```


```{r}
quality_effects <- fixef(quality_model)
quality_se <- sqrt(diag(vcov(quality_model)))
quality_chisq <- quality_results$Chisq
quality_p <- quality_results$"Pr(>Chisq)"
results_quality <- data.frame(Estimate = quality_effects,
                              Standard_Error = quality_se,
                              X2 = quality_chisq,
                              "p" = quality_p)
results_quality <- results_quality[-1,]
results_quality$Sleep_Component <- "Subjective Sleep Quality"
```

```{r}
df_list <- list(results_quality, results_latency, results_duration, results_efficiency, results_disturbances, results_daytime_dysfunction, results_global)
sleep_results <- Reduce(function(x,y) merge(x, y, all= TRUE), df_list)
sleep_results <- relocate(sleep_results, Sleep_Component, .before = "Estimate")
sleep_results <- sleep_results %>% mutate(across(c('Estimate', 'Standard_Error', 'X2', 'p'), round, 2))
names(sleep_results) <- gsub("_", " ", names(sleep_results))
```

```{r}
sleep_results %>% 
  kbl() %>% 
  column_spec(5, bold = ifelse(sleep_results$p == .04, TRUE, FALSE)) %>% 
  kable_classic()
```
